pages.text: 无人机是强大的可以用于各种自动化的飞行机器。其需要被编程才能进行工作；要做到这一点同样需要$(l:programming/programmer)编程器/$与一些$(l:programming/puzzle_pieces)编程拼图/$。$(p)放置下已编程并$(l:base_concepts/pressure)有气压的/$无人机时，其将执行所编程的任务。

pages.title: 自动充气Automatic Charging
pages.text: Drones are smart: when they're low on air, they'll search for a $(l:machines/charging_station)Charging Station/$ with pressure that has a $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#dispenser)Dispenser Upgrade/$ within the same dimension as the $(item)Drone/$. This will override the running program.$(p)When found, the $(item)Drone/$ will go to this $(item)Charging Station/$ and it will stay charging until the station can't supply any more air. After that, the $(item)Drone/$ will resume its main program.

pages.title: Automatic Charging (cont.)
pages.text: On a multiplayer server you might want to only allow your Drones to charge on your Charging Station(s). You can make your $(item)Charging Station/$ private by covering it by a $(l:machines/security_station)Security Station/$.$(p)Now only the $(item)Drones/$ placed by players who are whitelisted in your $(item)Security Station/$ will be allowed to charge.

When the $(item)Drone/$'s air runs out, its propellers will stop and it will fall straight to the ground. Beware: drones can take fall damage! A destroyed $(item)Drone/$ will drop itself in item form.$(p)You can dye a $(item)Drone/$ by crafting it with a piece of $(item)dye/$. You can also dye a $(item)Drone/$ in-world, by $(thing)right-clicking/$ it with a piece of $(item)dye/$. This coloring is just cosmetic but can help to distinguish drones at a glance.

pages.title: Debugging
pages.text: Hmm, why does that $(item)Drone/$ act like it does? Why doesn't it do anything at all? You can debug your program by using a $(l:armor/pneumatic_helmet)Pneumatic Helmet/$, with $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#dispenser)Dispenser/$ and $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#entity_tracker)Entity Tracker/$ Upgrades installed. With the $(item)Drone/$ targeted and the $(thing)Entity Tracker/$ active, press the $(thing)$(k:pneumaticcraft.helmet.debugging.drone)/$ key.
